Function reference

All functions

Covariate Correction for Gene Expression Matrix

Deviance Residual Transformation on Gene Count Matrix

Dotplot of the Effects of Perturbations on Factors

Dotplot of the Total Effects of Perturbations on Genes

Bayesian Guided Sparse Factor Analysis on Perturbed Gene Expression Matrix

Simulate a dataset with gene expression and perturbation according to a normal model

Pearson Residual Transformation on Gene Count Matrix
